trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Izmir
There was one other sighting in Izmir on or around June 25th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in Itikent Urla dining with my friend on their terrace.I first noticed a deep blue light in the sky and thought it might be from an airplane. Then me and my friends (6 people all together) saw that it was rather a fleet of strange blue lights, some bright some not so bright maybe a hundred of them or more traveling south bound over Itokent Urla. They were moving unhurriedly but quite fast for an object of such altitude. They had the bouyoncy of balloons. But some of them had very sharp blue lights shining. They traveled southbound and disappeared unhurriedly. The blue light parade lasted about 5 minutes before it disappeared.
Summary: A fleet of blue lights flickering and moving south in a sort of disorderly manner.
